alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Hamilton and central Herkimer Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boonville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ohio, Northwood, Grant, Gray, Nobleboro, Black Creek Reservoir, Wheelertown, Woodin Corners, Bull Hill, Wilmurt, Pardeeville Corners, Wilmurt Corners, Morehouseville and North Wilmurt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
